long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready for a hilariously dangerous adventure! With the Short Life Chrome extension, you can dive straight into the game from your browser. Navigate through deadly levels, avoid brutal traps, and try to survive without losing too many limbs. Whether you want a quick break or an extended play session, Short Life is now just a click away!

Why Install the Extension?

ğŸ® Quick Access: Launch the game directly from your Chrome toolbar for instant fun.
ğŸ•¹ï¸ No Setup Required: No need for downloads or installationsâ€”play in your browser instantly.
ğŸ’€ Physics-Based Fun: Experience ragdoll mechanics and funny, unexpected deaths anytime!
ğŸŒ Offline Mode: Play without an internet connectionâ€”perfect for long commutes or downtime.
ğŸ† Share and Compete: Show off your progress and compete with friends to see who can survive the longest!
Features:

ğŸ›¡ï¸ Dodge deadly traps and make it to the finish line intact.
ğŸ¯ Collect stars and unlock new characters along the way.
ğŸ¦µ Enjoy hilarious ragdoll physics and unpredictable gameplay.
â±ï¸ Replay levels to improve your score and perfect your survival skills.
ğŸ… Compete with friends and share your best runs with ease.
How to Use:

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click the game icon in your browser to start playing.
Survive and collect stars across levels filled with crazy obstacles.
Challenge yourself to complete levels without losing any body parts!
Ready to test your survival skills? Install the Short Life Chrome extension now and see if you can make it through every level without losing your headâ€”literally! ğŸ¤£
